snippet: The principal of Trumbull High School in Trumbull, Conn., said he was reversing his decision to cancel a student production of “Rent.”
abstract: The principal of Trumbull High School in Trumbull, Conn., said he was reversing his decision to cancel a student production of “Rent.”

headline.main: Connecticut School's Production of 'Rent' Is Back On
headline.print_headline: ‘Rent’ Is Back On At Connecticut School
